#summary List of useful issue tracker queries

= Introduction =

GrafX2 is a big project with a lot of issues. To help you find your way around it, here are some useful lists.

_add some info on how to report bugs here_

= General lists =

  * [http://code.google.com/p/grafx2/issues/list Full list of all issues]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/grafx2/issues/list?can=2&q=-has%3Aowner Non-assigned issues] 
  * [http://code.google.com/p/grafx2/issues/list?can=2&q=-has%3Acomponent Issues without component]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/grafx2/issues/list?can=2&q=Milestone%3A2.2 Issues for current release]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/grafx2/issues/list?can=2&q=Milestone%3A2.3 Issues for next release]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/grafx2/issues/list?can=2&q=-has%3AMilestone+OR+Milestone%3DNotPlanned Issues with no schedule]
  * [http://code.google.com/p/grafx2/issues/list?can=2&q=-OpSys%3DAll+AND+has%3AOpSys Platform specific issues]
